The PLT_SsdpDeviceSearchResponseTask class is used by a PLT_DeviceHost to respond to SSDP M-SEARCH requests from UPnP ControlPoints. More...

virtual void DoRun ()

Detailed Description

The PLT_SsdpDeviceSearchResponseTask class is used by a PLT_DeviceHost to respond to SSDP M-SEARCH requests from UPnP ControlPoints.
